content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. Regarding the rental price, I would like to propose a monthly rate of 800 Euros. This price takes into consideration the location and size of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Mannheim. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your prompt response, Bo Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on our discussion, I am willing to agree to the rental price of 750 Euros per month. Please let me know if there are any additional terms or conditions that you would like to include in the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to include a clause that says I will pay the rent in advance on the 1st day of each month. Is that acceptable to you?

Also, I would like to include a clause that says I will not sublet the apartment without your consent. Is that acceptable to you?

Finally, I would like to include a clause that says I will return the apartment in the same condition as I received it, except for normal wear and tear. Is that acceptable to you?

Thank you for your understanding.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for bringing up these important points, Bo Li. I can certainly agree to those terms. Regarding the advance payment, I am willing to accept the rent being paid on the 1st day of each month. As for the subletting clause, I appreciate your consideration for my ownership of the apartment and I can agree to that. Lastly, I can accept the condition that you will return the apartment in the same condition as you received it, except for normal wear and tear. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation in this matter.
name: Heinrich Heine
